body.name: Co-creation Sprint – In-person
body.description: Managing Surge Capacity in Travel Insurance is the topic for this co-creation sprint in partnership with The Travel Health Insurance Association of Canada.

body.name: Co-creation Innovation Sprint – In-person
body.description: Join us in The Netherlands to explore the most critical challenges using Design Thinking and develop real solution blueprints with some of the world’s top insurance organizations!

body.name: Lego® Serious Play® methodology – In-person
body.description: Experience a groundbreaking approach to problem-solving in our innovation session, introducing the revolutionary LEGO® Serious Play® methodology to Cookhouse Labs.

body.name: Design Tools Masterclass - In-person
body.description: Join this workshop to learn about the fundamental Design Tools and which ones suit your business needs, which are the most challenging and the easiest to use. Let our UX/UI designer walk you through the process of choosing the right tool.

body.name: Google Sprint Masterclass - In-person
body.description: Explore what you can accomplish using Google Sprint and learn how to ensure you keep solving problems in just five days!

body.name: Train the Trainer Masterclass
body.description: Take advantage of the opportunity to allow your innovation coaches, managers and innovation leaders to expand their knowledge on the topic and learn new skills from our Innovation Coaches.
